verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* and \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pi-hahiroth|strong="H6367"\w*, between \w Migdol|strong="H4024"\w* and the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Baal-zephon|strong="H1189"\w*: \w before|strong="H5226"\w* it shall ye \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

For \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, They \add are\add* \w entangled|strong="H0943"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* hath shut them \w in|strong="H5462"\w*.

And I will \w harden|strong="H2388"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, that he shall \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them; and I will be \w honoured|strong="H3513"\w* upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and upon all his \w host|strong="H2428"\w*; that the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so.

¶ And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*: and the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* and of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* was \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* against the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Why have we \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this, that we have let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* from \w serving|strong="H5647"\w* us?
And he made \w ready|strong="H0631"\w* his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with him:

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and all the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H7991"\w* over every one of them.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and he \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with an \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

But the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, all the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \add and\add* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and his \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w overtook|strong="H5381"\w* them \w encamping|strong="H2583"\w* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, beside \w Pi-hahiroth|strong="H6367"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Baal-zephon|strong="H1189"\w*.

¶ And when \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* drew \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and, behold, the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w marched|strong="H5265"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them; and they were \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* cried \w out|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Because \add there were\add* no \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, hast thou taken us \w away|strong="H3947"\w* to \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*? \w wherefore|strong="H2063"\w* hast thou \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* thus with us, to carry us \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?

\add Is\add* not this the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that we did \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* thee in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w alone|strong="H2308"\w*, that we may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*? For \add it had been\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* for us to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, than that we should \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye not, stand \w still|strong="H3320"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he will \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* to you to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* whom ye have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, ye shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them \w again|strong="H3254"\w* no more \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 14.13 \ft for the…: or, for whereas ye have seen the Egyptians to day\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* for you, and ye shall hold your \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Wherefore \w criest|strong="H6817"\w* thou unto me? \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they go \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*:

But lift thou \w up|strong="H7311"\w* thy \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w divide|strong="H1234"\w* it: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* on \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \add ground\add* through the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

And I, behold, I will \w harden|strong="H2388"\w* the \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and they shall \w follow|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0310"\w*: and I will get me \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and upon all his \w host|strong="H2428"\w*, upon his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and upon his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

And the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I have gotten me \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, upon his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and upon his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

¶ And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them; and the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w went|strong="H5265"\w* from before their \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them:

And it \w came|strong="H0935"\w* between the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* and the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and it was a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* and \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \add to them\add*, but it gave \w light|strong="H0215"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \add to these:\add* so that the one came not \w near|strong="H7126"\w* the \w other|strong="H2088"\w* all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* caused the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \add back\add* by a \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* all that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w dry|strong="H2724"\w* \add land\add*, and the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were \w divided|strong="H1234"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* upon the \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \add ground:\add* and the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add were\add* a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* unto them on their right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and on their \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

¶ And the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w*, and went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them to the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \add even\add* all \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and his \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

And it came to pass, that in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w watch|strong="H0821"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* unto the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* through the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* and of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and \w troubled|strong="H2000"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*,

And took \w off|strong="H5493"\w* their \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*, that they \w drave|strong="H5090"\w* them \w heavily|strong="H3517"\w*: so that the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* from the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w fighteth|strong="H3898"\w* for them against the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 14.25 \ft that they…: or, and made them to go heavily\f*

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, that the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* may come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* upon the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, upon their \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and upon their \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w strength|strong="H0386"\w* when the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w appeared|strong="H6437"\w*; and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* it; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w overthrew|strong="H5287"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 14.27 \ft overthrew: Heb. shook off\f*

And the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, and the \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w host|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them; there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* not so much \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them.

But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* upon \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \add land\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add were\add* a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* unto them on their right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and on their \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

Thus the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*; and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* upon the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shore|strong="H8193"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w work|strong="H3027"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.  +  r 14.31  t work: Heb. hand *
